sentences.en: As a result, the inter - bank money market has been inundated with liquidity.
sentences.cn: 其结果是, 金融市场流动性泛滥.

sentences.en: Beginning of the new year, which began to against our faces liquidity.
sentences.cn: 新年伊始, 这种流动性开始扑面而来.

sentences.en: Hong Kong's financial markets are characterised by a high degree of liquidity.
sentences.cn: 本港金融市场的特色是资金流动性高.

sentences.en: It encourages them to think about liquidity and concentration risk.
sentences.cn: 这就鼓励他们去考虑流动资金和不断聚集的风险.

sentences.en: It has also announced measures to inject liquidity into the financial system.
sentences.cn: 美联储还宣布了对金融体系注入流动性的措施.

sentences.en: Liquidity is one of the key differences between savings and investments.
sentences.cn: 流动性是储蓄和投资的关键区别之一.

sentences.en: Our liquidity was huge. I knew what our liquidity and cash was.
sentences.cn: 高盛拥有巨额流动性, 我知道我们拥有多少流动性和现金.

sentences.en: Packaging on making the basic requirement of 1 innovative ink, liquidity.
sentences.cn: 包装差制卡油墨的根基请求1 、 流动性好.

sentences.en: Safety, liquidity, profitability of commercial banks has always been a goal.
sentences.cn: 安全性 、 流动性 、 盈利性历来是商业银行的经营目标.

sentences.en: The bank has progressively increased its liquidity.
sentences.cn: 银行逐渐地增加其流动资产.

sentences.en: The company maintains a high degree of liquidity.
sentences.cn: 公司保持着很高的资产折现度。

sentences.en: The demand for and the supply of credit is closely linked to changes in liquidity.
sentences.cn: 信用的供求和流动资金的变化有密切关系.

sentences.en: The excess liquidity has led to the resurgence of asset bubbles.
sentences.cn: 流动性过剩已导致资产泡沫再度抬头.

sentences.en: There has a focus on banks'capital, liquidity and their mortgage exposure.
sentences.cn: 市场关注的是银行的资本 、 流动性和抵押贷款风险.

sentences.en: To be effective, liquidity injections must reach the real economy.
sentences.cn: 为了发挥效用, 注入的流动资金应该到达实体经济.

words.tran_cn: 液体的；清澈的；明亮的；易变的
清算人；公司资产清理人
[流]流动性；流动资产；[金融]偿债能力

phrases.tran_cn: 银行流动资金；银行资产流动性；银行清偿能力

trans.tran_cn: 流动性，流动资金，资产流动性，<财>资产折现力
trans.tran_en: when a business or a person has money or goods that can be sold to pay debts
